ndomitable gloves were enchanted items that bolstered the wearers defenses. They could be found in Waterdeep as of the late 15 century DR.
The gloves granted the wearer an uncanny ability to block attacks and defend themselves. The wearer could reliable halve the number of injuries they might have otherwise accrued in a battle.
* Raika, a barbarian adventurer, possessed a pair of indomitable gloves.
